directions: Stir first 5 ingredients in small bowl to blend. Season with salt and pepper.
Spread cream cheese over baguette slices. Top each with 1 salmon piece, then generous 1 teaspoon relish. Arrange appetizers on platter.
ingredients: 6 ounces thinly sliced smoked salmon, cut into 24 pieces
title: Smoked Salmon on Sourdough Rounds with Caper-Dill Relish
